QuestData.Title: Consumed by Vengeance
QuestData.Description: They... they came out of nowhere. From that direction.$B$B<The young girl points vaguely west through her tears.>$B$BThey were on their nasty wolves.$B$BPlease, commander, my family's honor is at stake. Will you get vengeance for me?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Exact vengeance upon this Warsong orc for what he did to Olgra's family.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, commander. You really are the greatest $c like everyone says!
